name: THE LIFEPLAY
description:
ATTENTION! READ HERE BEFORE PLAYING!

This is a WebGL game and maybe your computer may not be ready to play it, because sometimes browser games have problems like frame rate drop or lag. Follow this short tutorial to setting your PC to play fine and without issues a browser game in WEBGL!

Done? Perfect, let's start.

Let’s build our world together.

The Lifeplay isn't a simple game: is YOUR game. If you want to play a free videogame that you can transformed thanks to your choices, join us and partecipate to the development of this project.

A social game experience.

Into the Lifeplay, gamers make contents all together: so, work with other creators to explore new environments, generate new quests, face dangerous enemies and more other.

Enjoy the Gameocracy.

But how to partecipate to the game development?
The answer is simple: "GAMEOCRACY". Follow the Lifeplay social media channels (link below) and take part regularly to sondages and elections to work with the Game Developer and make changes to the game. Your opinion matters!
